body:
- Starting with version 2.0, OpenMPI no longer provides C++ bindings by default (libmpi_cxx.so). Add a configure option to instruct the build to also build and install libmpi_cxx.so.
- This MPI feature is needed by at least one spack package (moab).
- Fix a bad hash value for moab-4.9.1.
title: For OpenMPI v 2+, add a configure option to provide C++ bindings.
